RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHANKINSTINE was hustled away from the gate to duel for the lead from the three path to the quarter pole then shook loose briefly but was challenged by SHOETRICK in the stretch drive and won the nod. SHOETRICK was unhurried down the backstretch then made a four wide bid at the seven sixteenth pole and engaged the leader at the three sixteenth pole, matched strides with SHANKINSTINE down the stretch but lost the nod. TSURIS was off the pace down the backstretch then angled out to three wide at the five sixteenths pole to make a late run, moved back to the inside in the final furlong but was too late. PLAY MASTER broke in at the start then dueled for the lead from the inside to the quarter pole and gave way. ST PIERRE was four wide into the first turn then tracked the leaders down the backstretch ran into traffic entering the final turn and didn't make a bid. MY UNCLE BILLY dueled for the lead from between horses to the half pole and was through. R T'S IRON MAN was never involved. A JOCKEY OBJECTION WAS POSTED, THE JOCKEY OF TSURIS CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEYS OF PLAY MASTER AND SHANKINSTINE FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AT THE START OF THE RACE, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Play Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, dueled inside, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Tsuris
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, angle out 5/16p, late run angle in, too late

ENTRY.NAME: Shankinstine
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled away, dueled for lead, fought gamely, won nod

ENTRY.NAME: My Uncle Billy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for lead, through after half

ENTRY.NAME: St Pierre
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w1st, tracked leaders, traffic 2nd turn, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Shoetrick
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, 4w7/16p, engaged 3/16p, match strides, out nodded

ENTRY.NAME: R T's Iron Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 80. Starter Allowance Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5000 OR LESS IN ONE OF THEIR LAST THREE STARTS. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 21, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since January 21, 2023 Allowe d 5 lbs. (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAVVY SHIPMAN was allowed to settle down the backstretch then launched her bid from three wide at the three eighths pole, moved out to four wide in upper stretch and closed willingly. GURKHA GOLD (IRE) was unhurried down the backstretch then made a rail bid on the turn then angled out to three wide at the top of the stretch for a late run and proved second best. FOR REAL ALICE roused to the front to duel for the lead from outside of REBECCA G to the three furlong pole then inched away, was collared at the eighth pole and tired. REBECCA G was hustled along to battle for the lead from the inside of FOR REAL ALICE to the three furlong pole then faded. HARLANS WARRIOR tracked the leaders from the inside but failed to menace. A. K. A. GRAMS raced in the middle of the pack from off the rail and retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Harlans Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, inside, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Gurkha Gold (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, rail bid turn, angled out 3w, late run, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: A. K. A. Grams
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, off rail, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Savvy Shipman
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3w3/8p, 4wupper, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Rebecca G
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, duel for lead, faded

ENTRY.NAME: For Real Alice
ENTRY.COMMENT: roused to front, duel for lead, inched away, collared 1/8p, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MADISON'S SCREEN was hustled away from the gate to press the pace from the two path then took over at the three eighths pole and drew off. MARDI GRAS ALARM stalked the pace from the two path then made a bid at the seven sixteenths pole and had her best strides late. ASPIRATIONAL tracked the leaders from the four path then made a mild bid at the three furlong pole and passed tiring rivals. MAEMAEMAY saved ground to no avail. CONTINENTAL RED was within striking distance in the three path down the backstretch but failed to menace. GATSBY'S GIFT was away alertly to set a pressured pace to the three furlong pole and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Maemaemay
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Mardi Gras Alarm
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 7/16p, best strides late

ENTRY.NAME: Continental Red
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: striking distance, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Aspirational
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, mild bid, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Gatsby's Gift
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressured pace, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Madison's Screen
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled away, pressed pace, led 3/8p, drew off,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JEFFROW was allowed to settle down the backstretch then move to four wide at the three furlong pole tipping out to five wide in upper stretch to cruise home for the win. MARTINIZED was off the pace around the first turn then moved up on the backstretch to vie for the lead from the two path then was shuffled out at the seven sixteenths pole, made a rebid and took the lead at the five sixteenths pole but was caught in late stretch but held on to be second best. TOUCHDOWN JOE was roused to the front to vie for the lead around the first turn then took a brief lead into the backstretch, had to check slightly at the seven sixteenths pole, re-engaged and fought gamely to mid stretch and tired. SCORING DRIVE was unhurried down the backstretch then made a rail bid on the final turn and passed tiring rivals. SARAH'S VISION went four wide into the first turn then moved up to take the lead at the half pole but was quickly collared and gave way. WESTERN STAR cut the corner into the first turn to take a brief lead then pressed the pace to the three eighths pole and faded. BATTLE OF WILL raced in the middle of the pack and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Western Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief lead, pressed pace, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Jeffrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4w3/8p, 5wupper, cruised home

ENTRY.NAME: Touchdown Joe
ENTRY.OWNER: Angelle Glenn M and Tamporello Glenn A
ENTRY.COMMENT: roused, vied for lead, checked, gamely, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Martinized
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, vied for lead, shuffled, rebid, led, caught, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Sarah's Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w1st, moved up, led, collared, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Scoring Drive
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, rail bid, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Battle of Will
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 21, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE OCTOBER 21, 2022. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SMOOTH COLLIERY was allowed to settle early then launched a four wide bid at the three eighths pole, made a late rally to be just up. NOSY BANKER was forwardly placed around the turn then angled in at the eighth pole and gave a late kick to just miss. MUCHO MARVIN was away alertly to press the pace early then took the lead at the half pole and was out finished in the stretch. MR. PRIORITY was unhurried down the backstretch then made a late three wide bid but was too late. BORN AGAIN GEORGE raced near the back while saving ground to no avail. SCHNELL was unhurried and never a factor. CRUSADER EXPRESS tracked the leaders from the three path but failed to menace. GRACIDA was not involved. MINISTER'S MEDAL was off the pace on the inside to the quarter pole and weakened. QUEST FOR AVETTE was hustled to the lead for a half and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Gracida
ENTRY.COMMENT: not involved

ENTRY.NAME: Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Born Again George
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, saved ground, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, late 3wbid, too late

ENTRY.NAME: Minister's Medal
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Quest for Avette
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to lead, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Colliery
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4w3/8, late rally, just up

ENTRY.NAME: Nosy Banker
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, angled in, late kick, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Marvin
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed pace, led, out finished

ENTRY.NAME: Crusader Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE APRIL 21, 2022. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 21, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since February 21, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500, if for $6,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHROME SAVAGE raced near the back around the first turn then moved up from three wide to stalk the pace down the backstretch, then made a three wide bid at the seven sixteenth pole to take the lead at the quarter pole and dug in late to hold off late challenges. BEAUTIFUL ENDING tracked the leaders from the inside to the middle of the final turn then lacked room at the quarter pole but waited an moved through opening to make a rebid but was too late and couldn't catch the winner. ANN'S STORM was off the pace around the first turn then settled back down the backstretch, made a three wide bid at the five sixteenths pole and gave a late kick to be up for the show. PRETTY PRODUCTION went to the front to set the pace to the five sixteenth pole then was collared and gave way grudgingly. LAKE RUNNER was unhurried down the backstretch while saving ground then made a mild bid on the final turn, moved out to four or five wide in the stretch to make a late run to improve postition. MISSGREELEY'SSONG was allowed to settle down the backstretch then moved out to five wide in upper stretch but didn't make a rally. CAJUN SHOTS hopped at the start and broke outward, then rushed up to be off the pace to the final turn and weakened. BEAUTIFULANDWILD was rank early then moved up from three wide on the backstretch to be off the pace but was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Chrome Savage
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, moved up, stalked pace, led 1/4p, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Runner
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, saved ground, mild bid, 4-5wstretch, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Ending
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, lacked room, rebid, too late

ENTRY.NAME: Missgreeley'ssong
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 5wupper, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Beautifulandwild
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank early, 3wbackstretch, off pace, through after half

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Production
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, collared, gave way grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Ann's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, settled back, 3w5/16p, late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Shots
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, rushed up, off pace, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 21, 2022. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 21, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500, if for $6,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Conside red In Weight And Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAREWELL TIME was hustled along to press the pace from the three path then took the lead at the three eighths pole and drew clear. IN THE ARCH raced near the back to the middle of the turn then made a four wide bid at the quarter pole to make a late run and was a clear second. BUNKIE'S SONG was off the pace early then dropped back to the middle of the pack on the turn then made a late rally to be up of the show. GIMMEASOUND went to a challenged lead to the three eighths pole and slowly faded. SUN SQUALL raced near the back through the turn and passed tiring rivals in the stretch. MOVE IT had no speed and was never a threat. LET IT B vied for the lead from between horses to the half pole and weakened. KNOCKALITTLELOUDER tracked the leaders from five wide to the turn then moved in to three wide to make a mild bid around the turn but faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Gimmeasound
ENTRY.COMMENT: challenged lead, slow fade

ENTRY.NAME: Let It B
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Bunkie's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace early, middle of pack, rallied for show

ENTRY.NAME: Sun Squall
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Farewell Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, pressed pace, led 3/8p, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Knockalittlelouder
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, mild bid, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Move It
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: In the Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, 4w1/4p, late run, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 37000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 21, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WOODS N WATER was slow into his stride on the backstretch then gained momentum at the five furlong pole and made a looming three wide bid around the turn while closing willingly to prove the best. FATHER GOOSE was off the pace in the two path then engaged the leader at the quarter pole to take a brief lead to the eighth pole where he was caught but held on for the place. DRILLING REPORT raced in the middle of the pack to the turn then made a rail bid into the stretch and fought gamely to just miss the place. BIND FAITH raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch then made a three wide bid at the three furlong pole and faltered. AZTAR tracked the leaders down the backstretch then moved out to five wide in upper stretch to make a mild bid and improved position. MAGAWILDTIME raced near the back down the backstretch then made a mild bid on the turn and drifted out in upper stretch but was never a threat. FLASHY PREMO had no speed and was not a factor. GOLD PUNCH was roused to a clear lead to set the pace to the quarter pole then was headed and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Magawildtime
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, mild bid, drifted out, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Drilling Report
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, rail bid, fought gamely, missed place

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Premo
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Punch
ENTRY.COMMENT: roused to lead, set pace, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Aztar
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 5wupper, mild bid, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Woods N Water
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride, 3wturn, closed willingly,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Orange Grove Thoroughbreds, Inc. & Richard Painter

ENTRY.NAME: Father Goose
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, engaged leader, led 1/4p, caught 1/8p, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bind Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 3wbid 3/8p, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 7F Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 21000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRADER PRICE stalked the pace down the backstretch then made a five wide bid at the three furlong pole to engage the leader at the three sixteenths pole and took the lead at the eighth pole and drew clear. RACY BILLE was rushed to the lead from the three path then was headed at the three sixteenths pole and gave way grudgingly. CASH HOLIDAY tracked the leaders from the inside then moved out the three wide at the five sixteenths pole to close fastest to be the best of the rest. CAJUN CONNECTION pressed the pace from the inside to the five sixteenths pole and weakened. IRON N STEEL was off the pace in the four path on the backstretch then moved in to the two path to move up on the turn but lacked the late kick. BASTI BLUE was unhurried to the turn then made a bid from four wide around the turn and moving out farther to five wide into upper stretch but was empty. MAIN DUDE vied for the lead from the two path to the five sixteenths pole and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Connection
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Basti Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, 4wturn, 5wupper, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Main Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Racy Bille
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, headed 3/16p, gave way grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Iron N Steel
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, bid turn, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Cash Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastian J Ronald and Sebastian Linda P
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 3w5/16p, closed fastest, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Trader Price
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 5w3/8p, engaged 3/16p, drew clear,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kevin Thomas Atwood & Thomas Donald Atwood
